name: Dodge (itch) (Magisko)
description:
Hi there, I'm an indie game developer who has just recently found about unity, I'll be more than happy to get any kind of support, it will help me improve and make more games.

This is (finally) my first game on unity, and as its name suggests, you will have to dodge the blades for 60 seconds in order to pass levels, the game consists of 5 level.

*** Controls ***

Up arrow : Jump.                                                                                                                                                          Down arrow : Duck.

the first level is easy the second is a bit harder, the third is easy, and the fourth is the hardest, but the fifth is impossible (but you may give it a try) .

there is a problem with the jumping sound making it play randomly, i still haven't figured why it does that, but i'll try to fix it in the future
